required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of TG103 Injection in Overweight/Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Phase II Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of TG103 Injection in Overweight/Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety, PK and PD characteristics of different doses of TG103 injection in overweight/obese subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the efficacy of TG103 injection in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus combined with overweight/obesity. The study will consist of 3 periods: an approximately 4-week screening period, a 20-week treatment period, and a 3-week safety follow-up period. Eligible subjects will be randomized in a 1:1:1:1 ratio into four paralleled dose groups (15 mg, 22.5 mg ,30 mg and placebo) with 52 subjects in each group. Within each group, subjects will receive TG103 injection or placebo subcutaneously (SC) once a week (QW) over a period of 20 weeks. Each group will be started at a low dose of 7.5 mg and gradually up-titrated at weekly intervals until the target dose.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) from baseline to week 20
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day 141 (the end of the 20-week treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in body weight from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in body mass index (BMI) from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in waist circumference from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in waist-hip ratio from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood pressure(systolic and diastolic blood pressure) from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood lipid from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects with a baseline weight loss of more than 5%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)
Baseline through Day155 (the end of the follow-up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum steady-state plasma drug concentration during a dosage interval (Cmin, SS)
Change in fasting blood glucose from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day 141 (the end of the 20-week treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in 2-hour postprandial blood glucose from baseline to week 20
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Day 141 (the end of the 20-week treatment)

secondary_outcome.measure: The occurrence of TG103 anti-drug antibodies (ADA) and neutralizing antibody (Nab).

arm_group.description: TG103 (15 mg) will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly.
TG103 (22.5 mg) will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly.
TG103 (30 mg) will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly.
Placebo will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly.

overall_official.affiliation: The Affiliated Nanjing Drum Tower Hospital of Nanjing University Medical School
